name: Block Rush
description:
A game of bouncing and dodging. Steer your cube to the golden exit. Bounce on the green tiles but dodge the white ones. Flip the gravity and make your way to the exit. Good luck!

Supports both arrow keys and accelerometer. Most of the major features are in, and at this point the game's in a very playable state. But I've got a few more ideas to work on, and I need to make a ton more levels. If you've got any awesome ideas that you'd like to see in the game, please let me know!

Thanks for giving it a play!
